Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordan Poole led both teams in 3 stats, but the Wizards fall short to the Warriors.
Draymond and Jordan Poole exchanged taunts just before halftime tonight.
Others: Jordan Poole finished with 24 points, one rebound, three assists, three steals, and four blocks while shooting 8/20 from the field and 2/10 from the three-point range in 33 minutes of playing time.
The Wizards lost by a score of 125-112 to fall to 2-4 in their first six games of the new season.
